metadataAttributes.Title: Risk Management Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Enhance Your Skills in Risk Management. Understand the theory and practice of risk management and the expected results from a successful risk management process.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Credit Risk Measurement and Management, Application of Financial Statistics and Probability, Market Risk Measurement and Management, Operational Risk Measurement and Management, Risk Management, Financial Risk, Leadership and Financial Risk Estimation and Management, Regulations, Credit Analysis, Financial Analysis, credit risk, Market Risk Management,
